kerala.name: Kerala
kerala.description: Known as 'God’s Own Country', Kerala is famous for its backwaters, houseboats, and beautiful beaches.

ooty.name: Ooty
ooty.description: Ooty, also known as Udhagamandalam, is a hill station in Tamil Nadu famous for its tea gardens and cool climate.

goa.name: Goa
goa.description: Goa is India's party capital, known for its beaches, churches, and seafood.

jaipur.name: Jaipur
jaipur.description: The Pink City of India, famous for its royal palaces and forts.
